snippet: The New York attorney general announced an agreement on Monday that will make it easier for wheelchair-bound patrons to buy tickets to plays at Theater Row, the 42nd St. home to Off Broadway theater troupes like the New Group and Keen Company.
abstract: The New York attorney general announced an agreement on Monday that will make it easier for wheelchair-bound patrons to buy tickets to plays at Theater Row, the 42nd St. home to Off Broadway theater troupes like the New Group and Keen Company.

headline.main: Agreement to Ease Ticket Buying for Disabled at Theater Row
headline.print_headline: More Ticket Access For Wheelchair Users
